content: Hi everyone, I am just starting here. I finished my PhD last year and have been slowly getting up to speed with rust. Its such a fun language that I thought that I would try and give something back by helping out here though I am also multitasking with job hunting. I am presently looking at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/53934 due to a post from @Esteban KÃ¼ber on twitter. Its a bit of a jump into the deep end but that's the sort of thing that I like!!
